titleStmt.title: To the most illustrious, John, Earle of Lauderdale, &c. His Majesties High Commissioner for the kingdom of Scotland, His Grace, a congratulatory welcome of an heart-well-wishing quill: hecatombe.
titleStmt.author: Murray, Mungo, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: End of text signed: M. M.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
